definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: Our high quality grey iron includes copper to increase thermal conductivity and wear properties.
sentences.chinese: 我們的高品質灰鐵包括銅，以提高熱導率和磨損性能。

sentences.english: For the world's high-temperature insulation thermal conductivity of the area of one of the lowest.
sentences.chinese: 爲目前世界上高溫隔熱領域熱導率最低的材料之一。

sentences.english: The thermal conductivities and thermal diffusivities of the material must be known.
sentences.chinese: 必須知道各種材料的熱導率和熱擴散率。

sentences.english: The problem is the low thermal conductivity of air.
sentences.chinese: 問題在於空氣的熱導率很低。

sentences.english: Quartztes and rock salt have the highest conductivities.
sentences.chinese: 石英岩和岩鹽的熱導率最高。

sentences.english: This instrument can measure soil thermal conductivity quickly with thermal needle method.
sentences.chinese: 該儀器用熱針法可快速測量土的熱導率。

sentences.english: Quartzes and rock salt have the highest conductivities.
sentences.chinese: 石英岩和岩鹽的熱導率最高。

sentences.english: It has been used successfully to determine the thermal conductivity of hollow glassy microspheres with simple equipment.
sentences.chinese: 用該法已成功地測定了空心玻璃微球的熱導率。

sentences.english: The insulating layer thermal conductivity value of table1 is calculated by the Al-Substrate CCL thermal resistance value.
sentences.chinese: 表1中絕緣層熱導率是由鋁基板熱阻值推算所得。

sentences.english: Quartzes and rock salt have the highest conductivities .
sentences.chinese: 石英岩和岩鹽的熱導率最高。

sentences.english: How heat dissipates through a material is a matter of the materials' thermal conductivity and thickness.
sentences.chinese: 某種材料的散熱能力與材料的熱導率和厚度有關。

sentences.english: The calculation method for selection of soil thermal conductivity is given.
sentences.chinese: 給出了土壤熱導率的選取計算方法。
